channel.title: Runescape freezing? SRL problem perhaps (or my shitty comps fault...)
channel.description: I made a previous topic, however I fixed that scar wasn't working... I didn't have the game set on high detail (yeah, I know..I'm kinda slow) anywho I thought a new topic would get more attention (I tried to delete the other one, it wouldn't work) and well when I load a script in scar..drag the crosshairs...and then run it runescape will lag...it will freeze up for 2 seconds and then 2 seconds later freeze up for 2 seconds again. I'm not sure whats causing this, but a lot of the times a script will be too laggy, it won't work properly, and sometimes a script won't even run even though in the actual scar client it says that it's compiled successfully. I just wanna be able to auto with scar...I used to auto with it tons back in the stupid3ooo guild miner era, why won't it work for me now >.<?

item.title: Runescape freezing? SRL problem perhaps (or my shitty comps fault...)
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

[quote=“sh4d0ws, post:11, topic:3797”]To the Dankness sounds good…

pc specs (one shitty ass processor…)

1.6ghz pentium 4 processor
a gig of ram…(as far as I know, thats a fair bit)
80gig hard drive (this is kinda irrelevant…don’t ask me why I posted it)[/quote]

u think ur pc sucks? im using a pentium 3 processor, 40gig harddrice and 512 of ram but i have a pc that would blow ur mind away

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape freezing? SRL problem perhaps (or my shitty comps fault...)
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

Is Scar possibly Losing the Client Window? thats what it sounds like to me honestly. After running a script and it lags stop the script then try and pick a color to see if you get actual cords or if there weird.

Read full topic

lags with every script…

hmm this is weird, Before aryan i used scar for ages with stupid000 and it used to be fine, then aryan got ownd and i started using scar again and it laged like a mutha fuka and i continusiously kept tried it and it stoped getting so laggy and started working. My computa is used to it now lol

item.title: Runescape freezing? SRL problem perhaps (or my shitty comps fault...)
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

jme_009:

I have the same prob(like, exactly), and I know that all my settings are correct. However it doesnt only do this in runescape, it does it on anything for me.

Are the scripts you are using use Bitmaps or DTM’s? maybe they aren’t loading them correctly.
